name: Arena Madness
description:
Arena Madness is a fun 2D action game where you are a man stuck in an arena with a bunch of zombies, and every time you finish the wave of zombies you can choose to upgrade your player, some of the upgrades include, but are not limited to, Faster fire rate, extra health, more ammo, etc. Each wave introduces more zombies along with a bigger arena. The game gets harder as it goes on, and is loads of fun to play.

Controls:

W, A, S, D to move the player.

Mouse to aim.

Click to shoot.

R to reload. 

Enter/Return to pause the game.
